item.title: Thousands mark 5th anniversary of George Floyd’s murder as they call for justice and decry Trump
item.description: Thousands are marking the fifth anniversary of George Floyd’s murder at religious services, concerts and vigils nationwide.

item.title: AP PHOTOS: Thousands gather to mark the fifth anniversary of George Floyd’s murder
